column3: Probably we shouldn't mention a version at all there - goes out of date too soon, especially with miniupnp :-)\n

Taking a step back here:
- Why do we need specific instructions about building upnp at all? Those should be documented by the miniupnp project.
- Using upnp isn't encouraged...
- People that build from source generally know how to set up port forwardings.

My new proposal: let's remove this section. Optionally replace with a pointer to the miniupnpc docs.
I agree with Wladimir (the main reason for me is the second one).\n
Updated to remove the build instructions entirely.\n
another change could be: `sudo make install`?\n
Hmm, thinking about it, I don't like recommending installing it globally at all\nE.g. the berkeleydb build instructions describe how to install to a local dir and use it there\n
